title.rendered: Fat Brain Toys + Harry Potter Week

content.rendered:
Fat Brain Toys at Gottwals Books

Fat Brain Toys are now at Gottwals Books! This family owned and operated company produces high quality toys that develop design and visual-spatial skills in children. For more information, check out the introductory video below, or come and explore these products at any of our locations.

Harry Potter Giveaway

TOMORROW is the last day you can enter our Harry Potter giveaway! Show us (we won’t keep it!) your wizard’s broom at any of our store locations to enter for a chance to win prizes, including a NEW Harry Potter book set! One entry per day, per location.

FREE Audiobook

Wrap up the summer with some audiobooks from Gottwals Books. From August 5-6, choose a FREE audiobook ($7.97-$11.97 value) with any $10 purchase.
